This feature will include a part (antenna based on GPS-2 concepts) that will allow satellites with the antenna to become GPS satellites. Satellites can be launched into different orbital planes and/or orbits, but a certain minimum number of satellites must be visible at any given time to make the GPS constellation usable. The GPS constellation should determine the precise (or close to precise) location of the user. 

I know that there's a mod for this, but after glancing at curse, that mod has only been updated for 0.23.5. Reportedly it works for 1.0, but not the current versions. It would be great of Squad can implement this for 1.1 or future updates!
It sounds like 1.1 will have a new gameplay feature that will be functionally very similar, where you set up a communication network with satellites.
